record-editor-panel.name: contact
record-editor-panel.query: select system_id, Contact_Method_Type.caption "Method", method_value "Value" from Person_Contact, Contact_Method_Type where Person_Contact.parent_id = ? and Person_Contact.method_type = Contact_Method_Type.id

record-editor-panel.name: address
record-editor-panel.query: select system_id, Contact_Address_Type.caption, city || ', ' || US_State_Type.caption from Person_Address, US_State_Type, Contact_Address_Type, Record_Status where Person_Address.parent_id = ? and Person_Address.address_type_id = Contact_Address_Type.id and Person_Address.state_id = US_State_Type.id and Person_Address.rec_stat_id = Record_Status.id and Record_Status.caption = 'Active'

record-editor-panel.name: classification
record-editor-panel.query: select system_id, Org.org_code, Person_Type.caption from Person_Classification, Org, Person_Type where Person_Classification.person_id = ? and (Person_Classification.org_id = Org.org_id or Person_Classification.org_id = NULL) and Person_Classification.person_type_id = Person_Type.id
